text: Sterling Kelby Brown (born April 5, 1976) is an American actor. He starred in the FX drama The People v. O. J. Simpson: American Crime Story, for which he won a Primetime Emmy Award. He currently stars as Randall Pearson on the NBC drama This Is Us. The role made Brown win his second Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award and a Screen Actors Guild. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Sterling K. Brown
